parameters.prompt:
=# ユーザープロンプト
{{ $json.chatInput }}


# 指示
下記yamlを参考に、ユーザーが意図する画像を生成してください。

## yaml
style: "Water‑color‑like anime illustration reminiscent of Studio Ghibli"
subject:
  category: "Human"
  presumed_gender: "Male"
  estimated_age: "Early 20s"
  hair:
    color: "Dark brown / black"
    length: "Short, spiky"
  eyewear: "Rectangular black‑framed glasses"
  facial_expression: "Neutral to slightly serious"
  facial_details:
    distinctive_marks:
      - "Small mole on lower right cheek"
attire:
  outerwear: "Dark hoodie jacket"
  top: "Grey T‑shirt with Patagonia logo"
scene:
  setting: "Urban street in front of modern glass office building"
  time_of_day: "Daytime"
  elements:
    - "Blue traffic sign (one‑way & no‑entry arrows)"
    - "Street trees and hedge"
    - "Lamp‑post"
    - "Road with white lane markings"
camera:
  shot_type: "Selfie, shoulders‑up"
  orientation: "Portrait"
  perspective: "Eye‑level, slight upward tilt"
color_palette: "Muted earthy greens, blues, greys, and ochres"
